snippet: The former N.F.L. star Chad Johnson, known as Chad Ochocinco during his playing days, was sentenced to 30 days in jail for a probation violation in a domestic violence case.
abstract: Former NFL wide receiver Chad Johnson is sentenced to 30 days in jail for probation violation in domestic violence case.
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. star Chad Johnson, known as Chad Ochocinco during his playing days, was sentenced to 30 days in jail for a probation violation in a domestic violence case.

headline.seo: Chad Johnson Sent to Jail for Probation Violation
headline.main: Chad Johnson Sent to Jail for Probation Violation
